name: Gummy Factory (Mikael Cedergren)
description:
Gummy Factory is a wacky point and click adventure game placed in a cold-blooded world where sweets are made out of living candies. You play as two characters trying to solve the puzzles and save the imprisoned candies from the Gummy Factory.

Disclaimer: Unspeakable amounts of candy have been harmed and consumed during the production of this game
